export default class PlaybackCoreV2{constructor(videoElement,camId){let baseUrl=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'/api';this.video=videoElement;this.camId=camId;this.baseUrl=baseUrl;this.mediaSource=null;this.sourceBuffer=null;this.SEGMENT_SEC=4;this.TARGET_BUFFER=20;this.nextTs=null;// Epoch time of the NEXT segment to fetch
this.isFetching=false;this.started=false;this.isSeeking=false;this.seekTargetTs=null;this.checkInterval=null;this.abortController=null;}start(startEpochMs){console.log("[PlaybackCore] Starting at ".concat(new Date(startEpochMs).toISOString()));this.nextTs=startEpochMs;this.isSeeking=false;this.started=false;this.mediaSource=new MediaSource();this.video.src=URL.createObjectURL(this.mediaSource);this.mediaSource.addEventListener('sourceopen',this.onSourceOpen.bind(this));if(this.checkInterval)clearInterval(this.checkInterval);this.checkInterval=setInterval(this.ensureBuffer.bind(this),200);}destroy(){if(this.checkInterval)clearInterval(this.checkInterval);if(this.abortController)this.abortController.abort();if(this.video){this.video.pause();this.video.removeAttribute('src');// Clean detach
this.video.load();}this.mediaSource=null;this.sourceBuffer=null;}onSourceOpen(){if(this.sourceBuffer||this.mediaSource.readyState!=='open')return;try{// Main Profile Level 3.1 - Broad compatibility
this.sourceBuffer=this.mediaSource.addSourceBuffer('video/mp4; codecs="avc1.4d401f"');this.sourceBuffer.mode='segments';}catch(e){console.error("[MSE] Codec Error (Trying Baseline):",e);try{this.sourceBuffer=this.mediaSource.addSourceBuffer('video/mp4; codecs="avc1.42E01E"');this.sourceBuffer.mode='segments';}catch(e2){console.error("[MSE] Fatal Codec Error:",e2);}}}async ensureBuffer(){if(this.isSeeking)return;if(!this.sourceBuffer||this.sourceBuffer.updating)return;if(this.isFetching||this.nextTs===null)return;if(this.mediaSource.readyState!=='open')return;const current=this.video.currentTime||0;const bufferedEnd=this.getBufferedEnd();// If buffer is too small, fetch more
if(!this.started||bufferedEnd-current<this.TARGET_BUFFER){this.isFetching=true;await this.fetchAndAppend(this.nextTs);this.isFetching=false;}}async fetchAndAppend(ts){if(this.isSeeking)return;const url="".concat(this.baseUrl,"/playback/segment/").concat(this.camId,"?ts=").concat(ts,"&dur=").concat(this.SEGMENT_SEC);try{this.abortController=new AbortController();const res=await fetch(url,{signal:this.abortController.signal});if(!res.ok){console.warn("[MSE] Segment 404 at ".concat(ts,". Skipping ").concat(this.SEGMENT_SEC,"s (Gap)"));this.nextTs+=this.SEGMENT_SEC*1000;return;}const buf=await res.arrayBuffer();if(this.isSeeking)return;// Discard if seek happened
await this.appendBuffer(buf);if(!this.started&&!this.isSeeking){// Try to play immediately after first segment
try{await this.video.play();this.started=true;}catch(e){/* Autoplay block */}}// Advance strictly by duration
this.nextTs+=this.SEGMENT_SEC*1000;}catch(e){if(e.name!=='AbortError')console.error("[MSE] Fetch Error:",e);}finally{this.abortController=null;}}appendBuffer(buffer){return new Promise(resolve=>{if(!this.sourceBuffer||this.mediaSource.readyState!=='open')return resolve();const onUpdateEnd=()=>{this.sourceBuffer.removeEventListener('updateend',onUpdateEnd);resolve();};this.sourceBuffer.addEventListener('updateend',onUpdateEnd);try{this.sourceBuffer.appendBuffer(buffer);}catch(e){console.error("[MSE] Append Error:",e);this.sourceBuffer.removeEventListener('updateend',onUpdateEnd);resolve();}});}getBufferedEnd(){if(!this.video||!this.video.buffered||this.video.buffered.length===0)return 0;return this.video.buffered.end(this.video.buffered.length-1);}/**
     * ATOMIC SEEK - CLEARS BUFFER
     */async seekTo(epochMs){if(!this.mediaSource||!this.sourceBuffer)return;console.log('[MSE] SEEK TO',new Date(epochMs).toISOString());this.isSeeking=true;this.seekTargetTs=epochMs;// 1. Cancel active fetch
if(this.abortController)this.abortController.abort();this.isFetching=false;// 2. Pause video
this.video.pause();// 3. Wait for current append to finish
if(this.sourceBuffer.updating){await new Promise(r=>this.sourceBuffer.addEventListener('updateend',r,{once:true}));}// 4. Flush Buffer
// Note: remove() throws if duration is infinity or NaN sometimes, but handled by try/catch
try{const end=this.getBufferedEnd();if(end>0){// Must ensure we don't remove beyond current duration? NO, just remove all.
this.sourceBuffer.remove(0,end+1);// +1 safety
await new Promise(r=>this.sourceBuffer.addEventListener('updateend',r,{once:true}));}}catch(e){console.warn("[MSE] Buffer flush warning:",e);}// 5. Reset State
this.video.currentTime=0;this.nextTs=epochMs;this.started=false;// 6. Resume
this.isSeeking=false;// ensureBuffer loop will automatically restart fetching from nextTs
}/**
     * Map video time back to Real World Time (Epoch)
     */getCurrentEpochMs(){if(!this.started||!this.nextTs)return this.nextTs||0;// Logic: nextTs is "future". 
// We calculate how far "behind" nextTs the playhead is.
// video.currentTime is playhead.
// getBufferedEnd() is roughly end of buffer (which corresponds to nextTs).
const bufferedDuration=this.getBufferedEnd();const playheadPos=this.video.currentTime;const timeBehindEnd=Math.max(0,bufferedDuration-playheadPos);return this.nextTs-timeBehindEnd*1000;}}
